title: PBE Loot and Store
body:
Does anyone know when they will fix Shop(Store) and Loot on PBE Server, and why ping drop too much, my usually ping on PBE is 120 and he is solid, not moving from 120, and sometimes he drop to 300-600.
Pls somenoe reply to me i will be grateful.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
This is a typical problem for a normal EU player, or another country long away from north america.
Loot and Store should be opened today(Loot they said), but ye. I also am waiting for it to open up, I lit can't wait!!!

Loot plus Store equals Extreme orgasms, no-need--for-viagra-disease and Loot becoming a drug.
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

We don't have 100% visibility on PBE related stuff here in H&S, but feel free to hit up the [**PBE boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback) to see if they have any kind of timeline on the Store issues. You can always check the [**PBE Status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates too!
